details: Colicky cramp and spasm of bowels. Painful neuromuscular conditions, preventing sleep. Rheumatic disease associated with Bright's disease. (D. MacFarlan.)

Head: Throat very dry, pain on swallowing
Head hot
Throbbing headache in eyes and temples

name: Argemone mexicana
dosage: Sixth potency. Fresh juice is applied to ulcers and warts.
